mapper.sql: id, name, parentid, remark, leaderidlist, mnemonic, number, moneytype, tel, mobile, lagearea, regional, province, city, area, type, defaultsenda, financecenter, financecentername, parentname, deliveryrange, deliveryrangename, weburl, featurescode, isfinancecenter, istopay, istransfer, transfername, transfernumber, istariff,level, address
mapper.select: select a.id, a.name, a.parentid, a.remark, a.leaderidlist, a.mnemonic, a.number, a.moneytype, a.tel, a.mobile, a.lagearea, a.regional, a.province, a.city, a.area, a.type, a.defaultsenda, a.financecenter, a.financecentername, a.parentname, a.deliveryrange, a.deliveryrangename, a.weburl, a.featurescode, a.isfinancecenter, a.istopay, a.istransfer, a.transfername, a.transfernumber, a.istariff,a.level, b.name as provincename, c.name as cityname, d.name as areaname from eforces_incment a left join eforces_province b on a.province = b.code left join eforces_city c on a.city = c.code and a.province = c.provinceId left join eforces_area d on a.area = d.code and a.city = d.cityId where a.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select code as province from eforces_province where name like concat(#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
select code as city from eforces_city where name like concat(#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
select code as area from eforces_area where name like concat(#{0},'%') AND cityId = #{1}

select
from eforces_incment where isdelete = 0
and (name like concat('%',#{parameter},'%') or number like concat('%',#{parameter},'%') )
and parentid = ${parentId}
mapper.insert: insert into eforces_incment (id, name, parentid, remark, leaderidlist, mnemonic, number, moneytype, tel, mobile, lagearea, regional, province, city, area, type, defaultsenda, financecenter, financecentername, parentname, deliveryrange, deliveryrangename, weburl, featurescode, isfinancecenter, istopay, istransfer, transfername, transfernumber, istariff,level ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{leaderidlist,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mnemonic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{moneytype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lagearea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regional,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{defaultsenda,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{financecenter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{financecentername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deliveryrange,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deliveryrangename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weburl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{featurescode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isfinancecenter,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{istopay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{istransfer,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{transfername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transfernumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{istariff,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
